title: PlayStation State of Play Incoming! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.27.22
description:
Greg and Bless talk about the PlayStation State of Play, Xbox's dongle, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:09:00 - Housekeeping
The greatest TikTok of all time is up on @kindafunnygames and YouTube Shorts!
PSILY is live and casting the Horizon and GOW shows!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Anonymous & FargoBrady
The Roper Report  -
00:11:40 - PlayStation State of Play Incoming! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.27.22
00:16:48 - Do you think that this is a place where we could see Final Fantasy 16 or Final Fantasy 7 Remake PT2? - Best Friends Q:Nevans Island
00:23:10 - Sony says PlayStation VR 2 will have ‘over 20 launch games’ - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:34:35 - Ad
00:38:04 - Xbox’s Cloud Dongle Keystone Is Coming, Jez Corden @ Windows Central
00:45:15 - The Callisto Protocol 'No Longer Takes Place in the PUBG Universe,' George Yang @ IGN
00:51:10 - Diablo Immortal Release Times
00:52:52 - Phil Spencer Says He’ll Recognize Raven Software's Union After Acquisition Closes, Sisi Jiang (Jong) @ Kotaku
00:54:40 - Layoffs at Hangar 13, Jason @ Bloomberg
00:57:30 - Release the Neil Blomkamp cut of Gran Turismo?! Justin Kroll and Patrick Hipes @ Deadline
01:00:30 - GameStop will have PS5 Bundles tomorrow!
01:01:40 - Out today
01:04:30 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:
MON: We’re off!
TUES: ???? and Gary Whitta
WED: Greg and Janet
THURS: Bless and Tim
FRI: Blessing and Imran
